changelog:
• sched/tune: Disable boost & prefer_idle if battery saver is active
• dts: sdm632: Undervolt CPU
• msm: vidc: disable CPU L2 cache PC during video sessiotons
• touchscreen : ft5446 : update to Focaltech V2.2
• Merge tag 'LA.UM.10.6.2.r1-01200-89xx.0'
• zram_drv: Hardcode disksize to 2GB
• cfq-iosched: Apply RedHat suggested tunings for fast storage
• More optimization for shed/tune, block/cfq
• Fix some leaks memor
commit: First Release/stable build after long time.
